data.title: NASA announces discovery of flowing water in Mars

Pirate Bay Founder Finally Free After Three Years

Just a few days ago Saudi Arabia was admitted to the United Nations Human Rights Council. And today the oil-fuelled kingdom is set to behead a young man. Ali Mohammed al-Nimr has been sentenced to death for encouraging pro-democracy demonstrations during the 2012 Arab Spring. He was just 17 then.

China will contribute 8,000 troops for a United Nations peacekeeping force, China's President Xi Jinping told the United Nations General Assembly, a move that could make it one of the largest players in U.N. peacekeeping efforts.

An air strike in Yemen has hit a wedding party, killing at least 27 people
